FILE: cm002450v11.0.txt
DYAD: USA - LIBERIA
RIVALRY: RIV81
DISPUTE(S): MID4254 

PSNOTES: 

PS-LAST-CHANGED: 20170630
PS-LAST-CHECKED: 20170630

Territorial-Maritime-Boundary Issues Variables

MID4254 

TERRMID: MID4254 3 -- not territory 
TERRMID-CER: MID4254 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: 

TERRLINK: MID4254 3 -- not third party link to territory 
TERRLINK-CER: MID4254 1 -- certain 
TERRLINK-NOTES: 

MARITMID: MID4254 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID4254 1 -- certain 
MARITMID-NOTES: MID4254 Liberia protested the US ordering its naval vessel to retreat into its own waters as a violation of Liberia's sovereignty, but this was not a maritime MID because the US was not making a maritime claim and the border was not disputed. 

ISLMID: MID4254 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID4254 1 -- certain 
ISLMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARMID: MID4254 1 -- civil war 
CIVWARMID-CER: MID4254 1 -- certain 
CIVWARMID-NOTES: MID4254 from cm narrative, the US embassy was caught in crossfire between the government of Liberia and rebels. In response, the US ordered the Liberian vessel Chinook to the waters off the coast of Liberia. Liberia protested as a violation of its territorial sovereignty. Occurred 11/1998. Coded civil war MID because civil conflict in Liberia drove the events of this MID. 

CIVWARLINK: MID4254 3 -- not civil war link 
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID4254 1 -- certain 
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: 

COUPMID: MID4254 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID4254 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID4254 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID4254 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES: 

MID3 1993-2001:

MID4254
rivalry=2450 nationa=USA nationb=LIBERIA MID4254 19980900 -19981100 
 revtype1a=NOT APPLICABLE revtype2a=NOT APPLICABLE fatala=NONE fatalpa=0 lhosta=DISPLAY OF FORCE 
 revtype1b=NOT APPLICABLE revtype2b=NOT APPLICABLE fatalb=NONE fatalpb=0
lhostb=NO MILITARIZED ACTION 

The U.S. ordered the vessel Chinook to the waters off the Liberian coast after the U.S. embassy was caught in crossfire during a fight between rebel and govt. forces. Liberia protested this action as a violation of its territorial integrity. First day of dispute was on 9/00/1998 and last day of dispute was on 11/00/1998.

RIVNOTES: 

NARRATIVE-CM:

SOURCES-CM:

NARRATIVE-CR:

SOURCES-CR:
